resources.string: English, Tamil, Hindi, Telugu, Gujarati, Bengali
You have already voted with this Mobile!
Hello, Please tell or select your voting options as listed
The Voting options are … USSD , Voice Voting, and Normal Voting.
I am an Artificial Intelligence .. that I will poll your vote in highly secured manner based on your choice …
.. In your part of the constituency , there are .

Listen Clearly , I am going to list out the Candidates name with thier Polling number. , FOR Example If I said … 1,0,2,4 Arun .. , here 1,0,2,4 is a polling Number. and Arun is a candidate Name . . . You need to tell the prefered Candidate Polling number .. Once I listed out the Candidates details. You can also interupt me by touching the screen to tell the Polling Number in the middle \"
… Please touch the screen to tell the Candidate ID to make voting .. or .. If you want to repeat the candidate ID again .. say REPEAT \"
Please touch the screen to tell your Registered Mobile Number!
\"... Please touch the screen to tell the Candidate ID to make voting .. or .. If you want to repeat the candidate ID again .. say REPEAT \"
You had told an INVALID PHONE NUMBER , . a Valid Phone Number is Required
Touch the Screen to Say the Valid Mobild Number Again!
